page.title: 03Changing Times in Meltham
page.content: On{Thursday 13th June, 1985}me and five other children went to{Mrs Hi {rst's}house to meet her{aunt}and {father in law. Mrs. Carrott}was born in{1905}and{Mr. Hirst}was born in {1906.}They were both born in{Meltham. We asked how old they were when they left school, they were{13}and they were{5}when they started. They had no school dinners but if their parents worked, they took sandwiches for dinner. They told us the name of the first bus in{Meltham,}it was called the{'Yellow Peril'.}It went from {Meltham}to{Lockwood}where it met the {trams.}There were no{trams}in{Meltham because it was too steep up{Big {Valley.}The{train}went from{Meltham to{Blackpool,}and back for{2/6d. {(12.5p)
